content: materials - 4 8 skeins of purl soho s partridge 1 100% merino wool each skein is 131 yards/ 100 grams approximately 465 1010 yards required we used the color lemon tree - us 9 5 5 mm 16- or 24-inch circular needles 2 note our original partridge yarn has been updated to partridge superwash 3 this new superwash version only has 109 yards per skein so you will need 5 10 skeins of partridge superwash to make a scarf wrap the new yarn is also a touch thicker so please do a gauge swatch to make sure you re using needles that give you a nice fabric and expect slightly bigger finished dimensions gauge 17 stitches and 25 row = 4 inches in wild grass stitch see notes sizes scarf wrap finished dimensions approximately 9¾ 19 inches wide x 71¼ inches long wrap version designed by purl soho designers gianna mueller 4 and gaby bush 5 based on the original wild grass cowl by jake canton 6 1 https //www purlsoho com/partridge html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/knitting-and-crochet html collection_filter=23796 3 https //www purlsoho com/partridge-superwash html 4 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gianna-mueller-for-purl-soho/ 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/gaby-bush-for-purl-soho/ 6 http //www jakecanton com/
